1.text: Place a ripe pineapple on a cutting board.

2.text: Lay the pineapple on its side and slice off the crown 1⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) below the leaves.

3.text: Slice off the bottom of the pineapple so the fruit could sit flat.

4.text: Turn the pineapple upright and place a knife near the top edge.

5.text: Cut down the side of the pineapple from top to bottom to remove a strip of the peel.

6.text: Slice the peel away from the entire pineapple.

7.text: Look for the rows of eyes on the fruit.

8.text: Cut a diagonal line next to a row of eyes.

9.text: Slice another diagonal line on the opposite side of the eyes.

10.text: Pull away the eyes and discard them.

11.text: Continue to cut diagonal rows of eyes around the entire pineapple.
